TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BezierSegment extends System.Windows.Media.PathSegment
Public NotInheritable Class BezierSegment Inherits PathSegment
public ref class BezierSegment sealed : System::Windows::Media::PathSegment

summary.span: 表示在两个点之间绘制的一条三次方贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Represents a cubic Bezier curve drawn between two points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象存储对象和其他段。 Use a object to store objects and other segments. 三次方贝塞尔曲线由四个点定义: 起点、终点 () 和两个控制点 (和)。此类不包含曲线起始点的属性, 它只定义终结点。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (), and two control points ( and ).The class does not contain a property for the starting point of the curve; it only defines the end point. 曲线的起点是添加到的的当前点。The beginning point of the curve is the current point of the to which the is added. 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁体, 可吸引其自身的直线, 并生成一条曲线。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一个控制点影响曲线的开始部分; 第二个控制点影响曲线的结束部分。The first control point, , affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, , affects the ending portion of the curve. 请注意, 曲线不一定要经过任一控制点;每个控制点会将线条的一部分向自身移动, 但不会通过其自身移动。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself. ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是一种对象类型。A is a type of object. 关于功能，例如冻结和克隆，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

span.span: Geometries Sample

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方贝塞尔曲线由四个点定义: 起点、终点 (`point3`) 和两个控制点 (`point1`和`point2`)。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`). 此方法不允许您指定曲线的起点;曲线从要添加到的 对象的当前点开始。This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the object to which the is added. 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁体, 可吸引其自身的直线, 并生成一条曲线。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一个控制点`point1`影响曲线的开始部分; 第二个`point2`控制点影响曲线的结束部分。The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve. 请注意, 曲线不一定要经过任一控制点;每个控制点会将线条的一部分向自身移动, 但不会通过其自身移动。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方贝塞尔曲线由四个点定义: 起点、终点 (`point3`) 和两个控制点 (`point1`和`point2`)。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point (`point3`), and two control points (`point1` and `point2`). 此方法不允许您指定曲线的起点;曲线从要添加到的 对象的当前点开始。This method does not enable you to specify the beginning point of the curve; the curve begins at the current point of the object to which the is added. 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁体, 可吸引其自身的直线, 并生成一条曲线。The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve. 第一个控制点`point1`影响曲线的开始部分; 第二个`point2`控制点影响曲线的结束部分。The first control point, `point1`, affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point, `point2`, affects the ending portion of the curve. 请注意, 曲线不一定要经过任一控制点;每个控制点会将线条的一部分向自身移动, 但不会通过其自身移动。Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结对象 (或任何对象) 的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见, 此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
